oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Pvt. Wesley Smith Dorris
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Dorris, Co. K, 30th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, was killed at the Battle of Franklin and is buried in the Confederate Cemetery at Carnton. He is pictured holding his diary which he kept during the war. His friend Jack Sanders retrieved Dorris from the battlefield and helped him to Carnton, where he died from a throat wound.
